00008 #if !defined(Apc_Accessory_hpp)
00009 #define Apc_Accessory_hpp
00010 
00011 #include <Kernel/Types.hpp>
00012 
00013 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00014     Accessory
00015     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00016 class Accessory
00017 {
00018     friend class HeadSet;
00019     public:
00020         //TODO: enum-values must be hold up-to-date with acc.h!!!
00021         enum Type {
00022             None            = 0x0000,
00023             HeadSet         = 0x0001, 
00024             ServicePlug     = 0x0002,
00025             AcDcAdaptor     = 0x0004,
00026             GpsModule       = 0x0008,
00027             DataCable       = 0x0010,
00028             StereoHeadSet   = 0x0020,
00029             HandsFreeCarKit = 0x0040,
00030             Unknown         = 0x7FFF
00031         };
00032 
00033         Accessory(UINT16 *data = 0) { 
00034             if (data != 0) {
00035                 memcpy(m_data, data, sizeof(m_data)); 
00036 
00037                 // override type sent from driver on attaching
00038                 if ((GetType() == HeadSet) && (GetParam(1) == 0x21)) {
00039                     SetType(StereoHeadSet);
00040                 }
00041             }
00042             else {
00043                 m_data[0] = (UINT16) Unknown;
00044             }
00045         }
00046     
00047         Type GetType() const { return (Type) m_data[0]; };
00048         void SetType(Type type) { m_data[0] = (UINT16) type; };
00049 
00050         UINT16 GetParam(INT i) const { return ((i >= 0 && i <= 7) ? m_data[i] : 0xffff); };
00051         void SetParam(INT i, UINT16 param) { if (i >= 0 && i <= 7) m_data[i] = param; };
00052 
00053     private:
00054         UINT16 m_data[8];
00055 };
00056 
00057 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00058     HeadSet
00059     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00060 class HeadSet {
00061     public:
00062         HeadSet(Accessory *accessory) : m_accessory(accessory) { 
00063             ASSERT_ALWAYS(accessory != 0 && ((accessory->GetType() == Accessory::HeadSet) || (accessory->GetType() == Accessory::StereoHeadSet))); 
00064         }
00065         void SetAttached(BOOLEAN attached) { m_accessory->m_data[1] = (BOOLEAN) attached; } 
00066         BOOLEAN IsAttached() const { return (m_accessory->m_data[1] != 0); }
00067         BOOLEAN IsMono() const { return (m_accessory->GetType() == Accessory::HeadSet); }
00068     private:
00069         Accessory *m_accessory;
00070 };
00071 
00072 
00073 #endif  // Apc_Accessory_hpp
